name: Roger Mcclellan
text: Reasonable prices and friendly service

resp.text: We Thank YOU for being a customer .

name: Phyllis Norton
text: Staff is very knowledgeable and friendly. Prices are reasonably priced and competitive. Products are the best?

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Mary Oshay
text: Just went to get inexpensive diesel

resp.text: Please let us know if there is anything we can help you with.

name: Kenneth Haney
text: Great place

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jimmy Vinson
text: Very friendly

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Wanda Ogle
text: This company is really awesome. Our company purchases fuel from them  on a regular basis and any time I have a question they always get me the answer. You will not go wrong by doing business with them. They get 10 stars in my book.

resp.text: Thank you Wanda!  We appreciate your business and our customers always come first!  We take pride in educating our customers and helping them choice the right products the 1st time.  You are like family to the Thomas Oil Company!

name: Steven Bumpers
text:
I contacted them for a quote on 55 gallon drum of DEF Fluid and received a response within a hour or so.

I placed a order same day and asked about delivery.

They delivered the next day to my location.

Thomas was very helpful with getting information to me and getting the DEF Fluid to me.

Charlie the delivery guy also called to confirm location as well.

I will definitely use again for DEF Fluid needs.

Great company and great customer service!

resp.text: Steven thank you for the great review!  We appreciate your business and have always put the customer first...our customers are like family to us!  We want to treat them like we want to be treated and we always follow through when it comes to business!

name: Doug Guimarin
text: They go above and beyond to ensure we have our products when we need them. From new installs of equipment, repairs and keeping our fuel and oil readily available, they get it done promptly. I highly recommend their services and have been a loyal customer since 1988.

resp.text: Doug we appreciate your support and the loyalty shown over the years.  Thomas Oil has always put our customers first in every area when it comes to service, products, education and delivery.  Most of all...you are like family to us!  Again, Thank You!

name: Bradley b
text: Great boss's Great place to work. Fast service. Next day delivery on most stuff. Unless out of stock. Anything you need call Thomas Oil.

resp.text: Thank  you Bradley!  We are happy and appreciate you being on our team!

name: THE ONE THEY CALL WISE
text: I buy all my erl here

name: Steven Whaley
text: Excellent company to do business with.  We are a small customer but never treated like it.  Great customer service, delivery and good pricing.

resp.text: Thank you Steven!  Our family prides ourselves on treating every customer; big or small like Thomas Oil Family!  We appreciate your business and Thank you for the review!

name: Jody Clark
text: Great people and great selection

name: Lynn Mason
text: Excellent customer service with an outstanding response to any of our needs.  The staff are quick to answer any questions that we may have.  They will also freely admit to not knowing an answer, however, they are quick to find the correct answer for you.  We at Montgomery Farm & Garden, are very appreciative to have them as an wholesaler and colleague.  The River Region is lucky to have them so very close!

resp.text: Lynn Mason, we appreciate your review.  It means a lot to our company and family in knowing you are happy and taken care of.  Again, Thank you!

name: Hayden Brooke
text: Excellent customer service and delivery.  They are always there to meet our needs. Great people and products. I would recommend them to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Hayden!  We always have valued our customers time and we understand that delivery of your products in a timely manner is important.  As a family owned and operated company we put each of our customer needs first!

name: Thad Sand
text: I have been a customer for many years with W.H. Thomas oil.  Bill and Howard are very knowledgeable on the Chevron products, as well as the rest of the staff. Jason is quite helpful also.  He has got us out of some mechanical problems more than once.  To summarize, these are great people to deal with.  The best thing is how dependable they are, they are there when they say they are going to be. Keep it up folks!

resp.text: Thad we appreciate our relationship with you!  The longevity speaks for it's self.  We're always here for you!  Thank you!

name: Mark Lemoine
text:
Very good service. Always on time. Very courteous to the customer.
Monitors our tanks and make sure we do not run out.
Best service around. Glad to do business with them.

resp.text: Thank you Mark!  We appreciate you and are always ready to assist you when needed.  Customer Service is what we take pride in and being family owned and operated.

name: Malisa Beard
text: They are very friendly, every time I call they are helpful and know exactly what I need to keep us up and running! Fast service that has never let us run out of any product that we need, if you need great customer service and supplies I recommend W.H.Thomas oil .

resp.text: Thank  you Malisa!

name: Cameron Dowdy
text: I can't say enough good things about this company! They are always eager to help in finding the right solution for the application we are using whether it be grease or oil on numerous jobs. They have the expertise to tell you exactly what is right for your application. The best thing is that they carry a HUGE inventory and can usually have it to us the next day so our jobs go off without a hitch. They are SUPER nice folks too! I would definitely recommend WH Thomas Oil for any of your jobs needing oil, grease, etc..

resp.text: You are appreciated so much!  Our family is going on 3 generations of ownership and we have continued to keep going strong in providing the best for our customers!  Thank you!

name: Dawn Russell
text: We use Thomas Oil for our warehouse / mechanic shop needs and the customer service they provide is outstanding.  Daniel has yet to let us down on returning requests for quotes and general product information.  This company is prompt with delivery and extremely attentive with answering questions and getting us quality products!

resp.text: Thank you Dawn!  We appreciate you guys and always working to keep our customer family happy and provide quality products!

name: Daniel Gifford
text: We have been getting our fuel and lubricant services through Thomas Oil for many years at this location. In the 3 years that I've been working with them they have been fantastic. Great customer service and fast response to our needs.

resp.text: Thank you Daniel!  We appreciate your loyalty and our family believes in putting the customers first!

name: John Crozier
text: I have worked with a lot of different vendors over the years and W.H. Thomas Oil ranks among the best.  With top notch sales support, dependable drivers and competitive pricing I cant ask for much more.

resp.text: Thank you John Crozier, we are always here to do our best in making each customer #1!

name: mike mitchell
text:
We have been buying grease from them for about 15 years. Great customer service. Good quality people.

Edd Johnson & Associates

resp.text: Mike Mitchell thank you!  We appreciate your business and happy to be of service to you guys!

name: Kathy Chesser
text: W. H. Thomas Oil is a great company that truly cares about the customers.  They treat them like family, great prices, excellent customer service with quality Chevron products.  They have been in the business for over 60 years and very knowledgeable in the industry.

name: Randall Lee
text: Best oil and fuel company to do business with in my area. They are the only company to ever give us next day service and sometimes same day service for fuel. Call W. H. Thomas Oil for your oil or fuel needs.

resp.text: Thank you Randall.  We pride ourselves with on time deliveries!

name: Brandon Curry
text: Good place to go get your fuel and oil any type oil grease what ever you need they have I work with con-site services  good place I recommend highly  good service they will help you with what ever you need

resp.text: Thank you Brandon!

name: Teri Gilbert
text: This is the easiest company to work with! They're fantastic people and we will always go to this company for our oil needs. Thanks to W.H. Thomas Oil for keeping Reno Refractories, Inc. up and running!

resp.text: Thank you Teri!  The Thomas Oil family has been in the business for over 60 years and enjoy working with good folks like you!  Our job is to make sure you are taking good care of to keep it going!

name: Robin Smith
text: They can meet all your oil & fuel needs very Christian  family run business   very friendly  staff

resp.text: Thank you Robin Smith!

name: Ashley Lee
text: GREAT PLACE TO USE. THEY HAVE GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE & THEY ARE ALWAYS DEPENDABLE AND AFFORDABLE. YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED!!

resp.text: Ashley being on time is important to us.  We know our customers can count on us being there!  Thank you!

name: Ben Hall
text:
Shapiro Metals
They are a very easy company to work with. They are always very quick with delivery.

resp.text: Thank You Ben Hall.  Thomas Oil takes pride in on-time deliveries and keeping our customer happy...after all you guys are like family!

name: MS LANISE
text: I have had the pleasure of knowing the guys at W.H. Thomas Oil for about two years now and I have received excellent customer service from Howard, Trevor and Jason when placing orders.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Lanise!

name: Eva Shadwrick
text:
Got great service...   Love the people...

Corp of Engineers/ R & D Maintenance Services

resp.text: Thank you Eva!  We appreciate you and your company!

name: The Mat Rental Company
text: We have been doing business with W.H. Thomas Oil since 2007 and they are always prompt on delivering and working with our Company needs.

resp.text: Thank you Janice we appreciate your review and value our customers like family!

name: Neil Bland
text: Awesome Place To Use. Awesome customer service. Very good service.

resp.text: Thank you Neil Bland!

name: Donna Smith
text: Great Company to do business with! Employees are friendly and helpful. When you are in great need they respond quickly. Thanks W.H. Thomas Oil - Clanton!

resp.text: Donna Smith, thank you!  We always strive to meet our deadlines and offer the best customer service to our customers...they are like family to us!

name: Rodney Holden

resp.text: Thank you Rodney Holden

name: Randy St John
text: Awesome group of people. Great attitude. Always there!

name: Dekota Frye
text: I been buying fuel and oil here for over 20 years and they are the best people you can work with absolutely wonderful very professional easy to work with very honorable company. JDF Logging LLC

resp.text: Thank you Dekota Frye!  We appreciate your business!

name: Anthony Harper
text:
Good folks always polite and friendly .
Can call a order in and get it delivered their next trip.

resp.text: Anthony we always are striving to deliver on time and keep a good attitude.  As we have always said, our customers are like family!  Thank you!

name: Tonya Powell
text: The Drives are always so nice that deliver our ⛽️

resp.text: Thank you Tonya!

name: Stephanie Downs
text: W.h.Thomas oil is the best place for all your oil needs!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie!

name: Cory Nabors
text: Excellent customer service from making the order through delivery. I have been a customer for many years and I have never had a single issue.

resp.text: Thank you Cory Nabors!  We appreciate the great review and we are always here to make sure you receive excellent service and products!

name: Phillip Hyche
text:
We have done business with W.H.Thomas for 20 years or more and they have provided us with the best products and service. It's been a privilege
doing business with them.

resp.text: Thank you Phillip.  Thomas Oil appreciate's the longevity of our business relationship and we are proud to have you as our customer.  You are like family to us!

Fast service on demand.
AA Neely Coble Company

resp.text: Thank you Adam!

name: Perry Clark
text:
Great, prompt service and support.
Morin Repair Services

resp.text: Thank you Perry Clark!  We appreciate your business!

name: Dwayne Coy
text: Great Service and always quick to respond to our needs.

resp.text: Thank you Dwayne Coy!  We are always here to help and make sure deliveries are in a timely manner.

name: Robin Smith
text: Great company for all your oil  needs very friendly  employees

resp.text: Robin, thank you and we appreciate you!  Thomas Oil family has always provided the best customer service and products.  God Bless!

name: Seeker777
text: Worst customer service I have ever dealt with. No communication, and terrible attitude!

resp.text: We can't imagine what could have happened.  The President and VP of W. H. Thomas Oil personally, greets each walk in customer with a positive attitude and would NEVER be disrespectful to a customer.  Thomas Oil is a family owned and operated business since 1956 and has always valued each customer as if they were family.  We provide the most information on quality products, if the customers ask or we will suggest what would be the best.  If you will give us a call or visit us...tell us what happened, we would be more than happy to try and understand you situation.  I can honestly say...based on our reviews...our customers are always pleased with the friendly attitude, excellent service, quality products, prompt deliveries and our family environment.

name: Stephanie Ivey
text: Great customer service! Love doing business with this company!

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie!

name: Doris Jefferson
text: Wonderful company that  truly cares about their customers.

resp.text: Thank you Doris Jefferson!  Our family is always here to offer the best Customer Service and Products.

name: Wanda Minor
text: Great Place too buy Oil ,Barrells just about anything .

resp.text: Thank you Wanda!  Thomas Oil is fully stocked to meet the demands in the industry and if we don't have it, we get it!  We are truly blessed as a family owned business to be growing each year.  Thanks to our loyal staff and our customer family!

name: Katie Hicks
text: Very friendly and great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you Katie!  We value your business and appreciate the review!

name: Joseph Roberto
text: They always do great by us !!

resp.text: Joseph Thank you for the review.  When it comes to customer service, we always treat our customers like family.  Providing the best products and services, always!

name: Eddie McCord
text: Great company to work with.

resp.text: Thank you Eddie McCord!

name: Sal Elia
text: THER ARE THE BEST

resp.text: We appreciate the 5 stars SAL!

name: Ryan Hand
text: Great people ... Ugly building. Great people.

resp.text: Ryan, we realize it's not the prettiest tool in the shed but appreciate you so much!  We are just down home folks that love our customers!  We're so busy, we forgot about our building...to busy concentrating our you!  LOL!  Thank you and we'll see you soon!

name: Heather Smith
text: Amazing place to be a costumer

resp.text: Thank you Heather

name: Monica Whitten
text: Great Company!

resp.text: Thank you Monica!

text: GREAT PEOPLE,GREAT SERVICE

resp.text: Joey thank you for the 5 stars!  We pride ourselves in providing the best service to all our customers and appreciate our customer family!

name: Betty Cann
text: Great company to work with!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Betty Cann!

text: Diamond rubber products

resp.text: Thank you Robert Burton!

name: cole eddy
text: DO NOT USE THIS GAS STATION. THEY TOOK 51 DOLLARS FROM ON THE DIESEL PUMP AND THE WOMAN WORKING ON THE MORNING OF JUNE 7th WAS TOO LAZY TO HELP

name: Sarah Curbow
text: The store is clean organized and the bathrooms are always presentable. The pumps are secure and the staff are always helpful.

name: Charlotte McDaniel
text: Sharon & mallory ARE THE BEST!!!!!!

name: Kit Bath
text: Awesome 24 hour store clerks are nice. Open and clean bathrooms.

name: Lester Combs
text: Stop here most Fridays and pick up some Krispy Kreme's and drinks for Work. Very friendly staff.

name: Brian Whitfield
text: The card readers at some of their gas pumps don't work and they rarely provide a receipt for at-the-pump purchases.

name: Jeremy West
text: They are alright, didn't have what I was looking for but courteous about telling me to kick rocks.

name: Ray -Frog- Carlson
text: Excellent folks. Very knowledgeable, ready to talk to, they take care of customers. You will not be disappointed dealing with them!

name: Blue On White KW
text: Great early morning service.  Nice woman helped us fill RV propane. Easy access to tank in rear of building.

name: Doris Lollar
text: I needed some paperwork and information on my account. The ladies were really helpful. They were busy but they were able to take care of everyone in a reasonable amount of time. They also provided important information regarding deliveries, the set up and efficiency of their products.

name: Caitlyn Lewis
text: I LOVE ALLGAS of Rainbow City, AL! They are so helpful and kind EVERY time I go there, and they go out of their way to make sure that I am a very satisfied customer! Thank you, Allgas! 😘😘😘

name: Daryl Bledsoe
text: Always a good experience with them folks in Rainbow City stop there every time I go through when I need propane

name: just Please
text: Nice staff. They give me gas

name: Rita Maltbie
text: Very disappointed with the Gadsden / RBC office. Cancellations since the end of November 2017. It is now Jan 2 they were supposed to be here today to install new 250 propane tank and new gas logs. Did they even call to tell me know one would be there, no left it to me to call then find out they want me to wait 2 more weeks to get gas ran to my house. So their 50+ years of prompt dependable service doesn't seem to dependable at all. They need more employees but that is their problem.

name: Hal Scoggins
text: They have are very good to deal with
